armyRule.name: Reanimation Protocols
armyRule.description: At the end of your Command phase, each unit from your army with this ability that is on the battlefield activates its Reanimation Protocols and reanimates D3 wounds. Each time such a unit reanimates a wound, if that unit contains one or more models that have lost one or more wounds, one of those models regains one lost wound. Once all such models have their full wounds restored, if that unit's Reanimation Protocols are still reanimating wounds, and that unit contains one or more destroyed models, one of those destroyed models is returned to the unit with one wound remaining.

abilities.name: Their Number is Legion
abilities.description: Each time this unit's Reanimation Protocols activate, if it is within range of an objective marker, this unit reanimates D3+1 wounds instead of D3.

abilities.name: Implacable Eradication
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

abilities.name: Guardian Protocols
abilities.description: While this unit is being led by a NOBLE model, each time an attack with a Strength characteristic greater than this unit's Toughness characteristic targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and arrive more than 9" from enemies.

abilities.name: Relentless Combatants
abilities.description: You can re-roll Charge rolls made for this unit. This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Infiltrators
abilities.description: During deployment, this unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from the enemy deployment zone and all enemy models.

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is made against this unit, subtract 1 from that attack's Hit roll.

abilities.name: Flesh Hunger
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, if the target is Below Half-strength, a successful Hit roll scores a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and arrive more than 9" from enemies.

abilities.name: Hyperspace Hunters
abilities.description: Once per turn, in your opponent's Movement phase, when an enemy unit is set up from Reserves within 18" of and visible to this unit, this unit can shoot at that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Whirling Onslaught
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If this unit made a Charge move this turn, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

abilities.name: Plasmacyte
abilities.description: Once per battle, when this unit is selected to fight, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability until the end of the phase.

abilities.name: Tunnelling Horrors
abilities.description: At the end of your opponent's turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield. In the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase, set it up anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy models.

abilities.name: Plasmacyte
abilities.description: Once per battle, when this unit is selected to fight, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability until the end of the phase.

abilities.name: Hard-wired for Destruction
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets the closest eligible enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If the target is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

abilities.name: Optimised for Slaughter
abilities.description: Re-roll Wound rolls of 1. When attacking with a gauss destructor, this applies only to MONSTER or VEHICLE targets. When attacking with an enmitic exterminator, this applies only to non-MONSTER, non-VEHICLE targets.

abilities.name: Wraith Form
abilities.description: Each time this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Self-destruction
abilities.description: At the start of the Fight phase, if this unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can destroy one model in this unit. If you do, roll one D6: on a 2-5, one enemy unit within Engagement Range suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Chittering Swarm
abilities.description: Enemy units within Engagement Range of this unit subtract 1 from their Objective Control characteristic (minimum 1). While this unit is within 6" of a friendly CRYPTEK model, this unit has an Objective Control characteristic of 1.

abilities.name: Scouts 9"
abilities.description: This unit can make a Normal move of up to 9" before the first turn begins.

abilities.name: Evasion Engrams
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". It cannot declare a charge this turn.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to the following units: Immortals, Lychguard, Necron Warriors.

abilities.name: My Will Be Done
abilities.description: Once per battle round, when this unit is targeted with a Stratagem, reduce the CP cost by 1CP.

abilities.name: Implacable Resilience
abilities.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from that attack's Damage characteristic.

abilities.name: Resurrection Orb
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the end of your Command phase, while the bearer is leading a unit, that unit's Reanimation Protocols activate and reanimate D6 wounds instead of D3.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to the following units: Immortals, Necron Warriors.

abilities.name: Adaptive Strategy
abilities.description: This model's unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Engrammatic Logic
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, select one friendly NECRONS unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Lokhust Destroyers or Lokhust Heavy Destroyers.

abilities.name: Destroyer Cult
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Driven by Hatred
abilities.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a unit that is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to a Skorpekh Destroyers unit.

abilities.name: United in Destruction
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

abilities.name: Crimson Harvest
abilities.description: Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and arrive more than 9" from enemies.

abilities.name: Lone Operative
abilities.description: Unless this model is within 6" of a friendly NECRONS BATTLELINE unit, it can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 12".

abilities.name: Inescapable Death
abilities.description: Once per turn, this unit can use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem for 0CP. When it does, it hits on 2+ instead of 6+.

abilities.name: Multi-threat Eliminator
abilities.description: In your opponent's Shooting phase, when an enemy unit within 3" of this model shoots a friendly NECRONS unit, after that unit has shot, this model can shoot at that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Immortals or Necron Warriors. Can join a unit that already has a NOBLE Character attached.

abilities.name: Timesplinter Mantle
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Chronometron
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model's unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of enemy units, that unit can make a Normal move of up to 5". It cannot charge this turn.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Canoptek Wraiths, Immortals, or Necron Warriors.

abilities.name: Rites of Reanimation
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

abilities.name: Technomancer
abilities.description: At the end of your Movement phase, select one friendly NECRONS model within 6" of this model. That model regains up to D3 lost wounds.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Immortals or Necron Warriors.

abilities.name: Harbinger of Destruction
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

abilities.name: Living Lightning
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, select one visible enemy unit within 18" of this model and roll 4D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Immortals or Necron Warriors.

abilities.name: Nightmare Shroud
abilities.description: In your opponent's Command phase, each enemy unit that is Below Starting Strength and within 6" of this model must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

abilities.name: Harbinger of Despair
abilities.description: Once per turn, at the start of any phase, select one enemy unit within 18" of this model. That unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Carrier Wave
abilities.description: While a friendly NECRONS unit is within 6" of this model, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

abilities.name: Advanced Quantum Shielding
abilities.description: Each time an attack targets this model, if the Strength of that attack is greater than this model's Toughness, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Scouts 8"
abilities.description: This unit can make a Normal move of up to 8" before the first turn begins.

abilities.name: Targeting Relay
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Malevolent Arcing
abilities.description: Each time this model shoots its twin tesla destructor, after resolving those attacks, roll one D6 for each other unit (friend or foe) within 3" of the target: on a 5+, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Obliteration
abilities.description: In your Movement phase, if this model Remains Stationary, until the end of the turn, its doomsday cannon has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Repair Barge
abilities.description: In your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot, select one friendly NECRON WARRIORS unit within 3" of this model. That unit's Reanimation Protocols activate.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model can transport 10 NECRON WARRIORS models and 1 NECRONS INFANTRY CHARACTER model.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and arrive more than 9" from enemies.

abilities.name: Translocation Beams
abilities.description: At the end of the Fight phase, a friendly NECRONS INFANTRY unit wholly within 6" of this model can embark within it.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model can transport 1 NECRONS INFANTRY unit.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Atavistic Instigation
abilities.description: Each time this model shoots, select one enemy unit that was hit. That unit must choose to either stand firm or duck for cover. If it stands firm, until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets that unit, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit. If it ducks for cover, until the start of your next Shooting phase, models in that unit have a -1 modifier to their Hit rolls.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-4 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Immortals, Lychguard, or Necron Warriors.

abilities.name: Grand Strategist
abilities.description: At the start of your Command phase, if this model is on the battlefield, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Lord of the Storm
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the end of your Command phase, roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 12" of this model: on a 2-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Immortals, Lychguard, or Necron Warriors.

abilities.name: Ancient Collector
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit that is within range of an objective marker, that objective marker remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, unless your opponent controls it at the end of any turn.

abilities.name: Surrogate Hosts
abilities.description: At the start of your Command phase, you can destroy one other friendly NECRONS INFANTRY CHARACTER model anywhere on the battlefield. If you do, remove this model from the battlefield and set it up anywhere within 3" of where that destroyed model was and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with all of its wounds remaining.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to Immortals or Necron Warriors. Can join a unit that already has a ROYAL WARDEN or NOBLE attached.

abilities.name: Master Chronomancer
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

abilities.name: The Stars Are Right
abilities.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, until the end of the phase, this model's Staff of Tomorrow has an Attacks characteristic of 6, a Strength characteristic of 12, and each successful Wound roll scores a Critical Wound.

abilities.name: Lone Operative
abilities.description: While this model is within 3" of a friendly NECRONS unit, it can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 12".

abilities.name: Mechanical Augmentation
abilities.description: While a friendly NECRONS BATTLELINE unit is within 3" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration of that attack by 1. In addition, each time an attack targets that BATTLELINE unit, worsen the Armour Penetration of that attack by 1.

abilities.name: Atomic Energy Manipulator
abilities.description: Each time this model destroys an enemy model in the Fight phase, until the end of the battle, increase the range of this model's Mechanical Augmentation ability by 3" (to a maximum of 12").

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and arrive more than 9" from enemies.

abilities.name: Feel No Pain 5+
abilities.description: Each time this model would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

abilities.name: Drain Life
abilities.description: At the end of the Fight phase, roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of this model: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Necrodermis
abilities.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

abilities.name: Enslaved Star God
abilities.description: This model cannot be your Warlord.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and arrive more than 9" from enemies.

abilities.name: Feel No Pain 5+
abilities.description: Each time this model would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: Each time a ranged attack is made against this model, subtract 1 from that attack's Hit roll.

abilities.name: Grand Illusion
abilities.description: After both players have deployed, you can select up to three NECRONS units from your army and redeploy them into Strategic Reserves.

abilities.name: Necrodermis
abilities.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

abilities.name: Enslaved Star God
abilities.description: This model cannot be your Warlord.

units.name: C'tan Shard of the Void Dragon

weapons.name: Spear of the Void Dragon - Strike
Spear of the Void Dragon - Sweep

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and arrive more than 9" from enemies.

abilities.name: Feel No Pain 5+
abilities.description: Each time this model would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

abilities.name: Matter Absorption
abilities.description: At the start of your Command phase, select one enemy VEHICLE unit within 6" of this model. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. This model then regains 1 lost wound.

abilities.name: Necrodermis
abilities.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

abilities.name: Enslaved Star God
abilities.description: This model cannot be your Warlord.

keywords: C'tan Shard of the Void Dragon

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and arrive more than 9" from enemies.

abilities.name: Feel No Pain 5+
abilities.description: Each time this model would lose a wound, roll one D6: on a 5+, that wound is not lost.

abilities.name: Transdimensional Displacement
abilities.description: Each time this model Advances, instead of making an Advance roll, you can remove it from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy models.

abilities.name: Necrodermis
abilities.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

abilities.name: Enslaved Star God
abilities.description: This model cannot be your Warlord and cannot have Enhancements.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6+3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6+3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Supreme Commander
abilities.description: This model must be your Warlord.

abilities.name: Voice of the Triarch
abilities.description: At the start of each battle round, select one ability to be active until the start of the next battle round: Phaeron of the Stars (re-roll Hit/Wound rolls of 1 for friendly NECRONS within 6"), Phaeron of the Blades (re-roll Charge rolls and +1 Strength in melee for friendly NECRONS within 6"), or Relentless March (+2" Movement for friendly NECRONS within 6").

abilities.name: The Silent King
abilities.description: While a friendly NECRONS unit is within 6" of this model, improve that unit's Leadership characteristic by 1.

abilities.name: Triarchal Menhirs
abilities.description: This model has 2 Triarchal Menhirs (each T10, 2+ Sv, 5W, 4+ invuln, OC 1). The Menhirs are destroyed if Szarekh is destroyed. Menhirs do not count for Damaged profiles.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and arrive more than 9" from enemies.

abilities.name: Eternity Gate
abilities.description: In the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly NECRONS INFANTRY unit that is in Reserves or Strategic Reserves. Set that unit up wholly within 6" of this model and more than 9" from all enemy models.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-7 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 4 from its Objective Control characteristic and subtract 1 from all Hit rolls.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D6+3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D6+3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Powers of the C'tan
abilities.description: Each time this model shoots, select up to two different C'tan Power weapons (Antimatter Meteor, Cosmic Fire, Time's Arrow) to shoot with. While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, you can only select one.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-8 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-8 wounds remaining, subtract 4 from its Objective Control characteristic and you can only use one C'tan Power weapon.

rule.name: Command Protocols
rule.description: While a NECRONS CHARACTER model is leading a unit from your army, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

enhancements.name: Veil of Darkness
enhancements.description: Once per battle, at the end of your opponent's turn, if the bearer's unit is not within Engagement Range of enemy units, remove it from the battlefield. Set it up in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase anywhere more than 9" from all enemies.

enhancements.name: Hypermaterial Ablator
enhancements.description: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Stealth ability. While not within 12" of enemies, models in the bearer's unit have the Benefit of Cover.

enhancements.name: Phasal Subjugator
enhancements.description: While a friendly NECRONS unit that does not contain a CHARACTER is within 6" of the bearer, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

enhancements.name: Enaegic Dermal Bond
enhancements.description: Each time an attack is allocated to the bearer, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

stratagems.name: Protocol of the Eternal Revenant
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after a NECRONS INFANTRY CHARACTER is destroyed.
stratagems.effect: At the end of the phase, set that model back up as close as possible to where it was destroyed, not within Engagement Range of enemies, with half its starting wounds.

stratagems.name: Protocol of the Undying Legions
stratagems.when: Opponent's Shooting or Fight phase, after an enemy unit resolves attacks.
stratagems.effect: One NECRONS unit that had models destroyed reanimates D3 wounds (D3+1 if CHARACTER-led).

stratagems.name: Protocol of the Vengeful Stars
stratagems.when: Opponent's Shooting phase, after an enemy unit resolves attacks.
stratagems.effect: One NECRONS unit that was targeted can shoot back at the attacking unit. If CHARACTER-led, gains [IGNORES COVER].

stratagems.name: Protocol of the Hungry Void
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.effect: One NECRONS unit gains +1 Strength on melee weapons. If CHARACTER-led, also +1 AP.

stratagems.name: Protocol of the Conquering Tyrant
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.effect: One NECRONS unit re-rolls Hit rolls of 1 at half range. If CHARACTER-led, full re-rolls.

stratagems.name: Protocol of the Sudden Storm
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.effect: One NECRONS unit's ranged weapons gain [ASSAULT]. If CHARACTER-led, re-roll Advance rolls.

rule.name: Annihilation Protocols
rule.description: DESTROYER CULT and FLAYED ONES units can re-roll Charge rolls. When targeting a Below Half-strength unit, add 1 to Charge rolls.

enhancements.name: Eternal Madness
enhancements.description: When a model in the bearer's unit is destroyed, roll one D6: on a 4+, that model can fight before being removed.

enhancements.name: Ingrained Superiority
enhancements.description: Each time the bearer makes an attack, a Critical Wound improves the AP of that attack by 1.

enhancements.name: Soulless Reaper
enhancements.description: DESTROYER CULT only. Enemy units within Engagement Range of the bearer's unit cannot Fall Back unless they roll a 3+ on a D6.

enhancements.name: Eldritch Nightmare
enhancements.description: DESTROYER CULT only. At the start of each phase, enemy units within Engagement Range of the bearer's unit must take a Battle-shock test.

stratagems.name: Masks of Death
stratagems.when: Opponent's Shooting or Fight phase.
stratagems.effect: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit gains -1 to Hit rolls for attacks targeting it.

stratagems.name: The Spoor of Frailty
stratagems.when: Your Shooting or Fight phase.
stratagems.effect: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit gains +1 to Hit vs Below Starting Strength units, and +1 to Wound vs Below Half-strength units.

stratagems.name: Murderous Reanimation
stratagems.when: Fight phase, after your unit destroys an enemy unit.
stratagems.effect: Your DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit's Reanimation Protocols activate.

stratagems.name: Pitiless Hunters
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.effect: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit can Pile In and Consolidate up to 6" instead of 3".

stratagems.name: Blood-fuelled Cruelty
stratagems.when: Opponent's Movement phase, after an enemy unit Falls Back.
stratagems.effect: Roll one D6 for each model in your DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit that was in Engagement Range: on a 4+, the enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

stratagems.name: Insanity's Ire
stratagems.when: Opponent's Shooting phase, after your unit is targeted.
stratagems.effect: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit that lost models can make a Normal move toward the attacking unit.

rule.name: Power Matrix
rule.description: CRYPTEK and CANOPTEK units re-roll Hit rolls of 1. If entirely within your Power Matrix (your deployment zone, or No Man's Land/enemy deployment zone if you control half+ objectives there), they can re-roll all Hit rolls instead.

enhancements.name: Dimensional Sanctum
enhancements.description: CRYPTEK only. The bearer's unit gains the Infiltrators ability.

enhancements.name: Hyperphasic Fulcrum
enhancements.description: CRYPTEK only. While the bearer's unit is entirely within your Power Matrix, re-roll Wound rolls of 1.

enhancements.name: Autodivinator
enhancements.description: CRYPTEK only. Each time your opponent gains a CP from an ability, roll one D6: on a 2+, you also gain 1CP.

enhancements.name: Metalodermal Tesla Weave
enhancements.description: CRYPTEK only. Once per phase, when the bearer's unit is charged, roll one D6: on a 2-5, the charging unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, it suffers 3 mortal wounds.

stratagems.name: Curse of the Cryptek
stratagems.when: Any phase, after an enemy unit destroys a CRYPTEK model.
stratagems.effect: For the rest of the battle, CANOPTEK units gain +1 to Hit and +1 to Wound against that enemy unit.

stratagems.name: Cynosure of Eradication
stratagems.when: Your Shooting or Fight phase.
stratagems.effect: One CRYPTEK or CANOPTEK unit entirely within your Power Matrix gains [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] on its weapons until end of phase.

stratagems.name: Solar Pulse
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.effect: One CRYPTEK unit's attacks gain [IGNORES COVER] against units within range of an objective marker.

stratagems.name: Reactive Subroutines
stratagems.when: Opponent's Movement phase, after an enemy unit finishes a move.
stratagems.effect: One CANOPTEK unit within 9" can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.name: Countertemporal Shift
stratagems.when: Opponent's Shooting phase, after an enemy unit selects targets.
stratagems.effect: One targeted CANOPTEK unit can only be selected as a ranged target by models within 12" until end of phase.

stratagems.name: Suboptimal Facade
stratagems.when: Opponent's Charge phase, after an enemy unit charges.
stratagems.effect: One CANOPTEK unit entirely within your Power Matrix that was charged has its Reanimation Protocols activate.

rule.name: Worthy Foes
rule.description: In your Command phase, select one enemy unit. Until your next Command phase, each time a NOBLE, LYCHGUARD, or TRIARCH unit makes an attack targeting that unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

enhancements.name: Honourable Combatant
enhancements.description: NOBLE only. Each time the bearer destroys an enemy CHARACTER model, your opponent loses 1CP.

enhancements.name: Unflinching Will
enhancements.description: NOBLE only. The bearer's melee weapons gain [PRECISION] and [ANTI-INFANTRY 5+].

enhancements.name: Warrior Noble
enhancements.description: NOBLE only. Each time a melee attack targets the bearer, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

enhancements.name: Eternal Conqueror
enhancements.description: NOBLE only. Each time the bearer makes an attack against a unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: Your Time is Nigh
stratagems.when: Any phase, after your opponent's WARLORD is destroyed.
stratagems.effect: For the rest of the battle, each time an enemy unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, subtract 1 from the result.

stratagems.name: Enslaved Artifice
stratagems.when: Your Shooting or Fight phase.
stratagems.effect: One NECRONS unit (not TITANIC) gains unmodified Hit rolls of 5+ score Critical Hits until end of phase.

stratagems.name: Nanoassembly Protocols
stratagems.when: Opponent's Shooting or Fight phase, after your VEHICLE is targeted.
stratagems.effect: Subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of attacks targeting that VEHICLE.

stratagems.name: Sentinels of Eternity
stratagems.when: Fight phase, after a LYCHGUARD or TRIARCH PRAETORIANS model is destroyed.
stratagems.effect: Roll one D6: on a 4+, that model can fight before being removed.

stratagems.name: Suffer No Rival
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.effect: One LYCHGUARD or TRIARCH unit's melee weapons gain [PRECISION].

stratagems.name: Territorial Obsession
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.effect: One LYCHGUARD or TRIARCH PRAETORIANS unit gains +1 OC. One VEHICLE unit within 6" of an objective gains +3 OC.

rule.name: Hyperphasing
rule.description: At the end of your opponent's turn, you can select up to 2 NECRONS units (3 in Strike Force, 4 in Onslaught) that are not within Engagement Range of enemy units and place them into Strategic Reserves.

enhancements.name: Dimensional Overseer
enhancements.description: Increase the number of units you can Hyperphase by 1.

enhancements.name: Arisen Tyrant
enhancements.description: The bearer's unit re-rolls Hit rolls of 1. If the unit was set up this turn, re-roll all Hit rolls instead.

enhancements.name: Hyperspatial Transfer Node
enhancements.description: Each time the bearer's unit Advances, add 6" to the Move characteristic instead of rolling.

enhancements.name: Osteoclave Fulcrum
enhancements.description: The bearer's unit gains the Deep Strike ability.

stratagems.name: Hyperphasic Recall
stratagems.when: Any phase, after a NECRONS INFANTRY unit is destroyed.
stratagems.effect: At the end of the phase, if there is a MONOLITH on the battlefield, set up that unit wholly within 6" of the MONOLITH and more than 9" from enemies.

stratagems.name: Quantum Deflection
stratagems.when: Opponent's Shooting phase, after your VEHICLE is targeted.
stratagems.effect: That VEHICLE has a 4+ invulnerable save until end of phase.

stratagems.name: Reanimation Crypts
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.effect: For each NECRONS unit in Reserves, that unit's Reanimation Protocols activate.

stratagems.name: Cosmic Precision
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, when a NECRONS INFANTRY unit arrives from Deep Strike or Hyperphasing.
stratagems.effect: That unit can be set up anywhere more than 3" from enemies but cannot charge this turn.

stratagems.name: Dimensional Corridor
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, after a unit is set up by a MONOLITH's Eternity Gate.
stratagems.effect: That unit is eligible to declare a charge this turn.

stratagems.name: Entropic Damping
stratagems.when: Opponent's Shooting phase, after your TITANIC model is targeted.
stratagems.effect: Attacking weapons gain [HAZARDOUS] until end of phase.

rule.name: Relentless Onslaught
rule.description: Each time a NECRONS model targets a unit within range of an objective marker, add 1 to the Hit roll. VEHICLE and MOUNTED models (not TITANIC) have ranged weapons with [ASSAULT].

enhancements.name: Dread Majesty
enhancements.description: OVERLORD or CATACOMB COMMAND BARGE only. While friendly non-TITANIC NECRONS units are within 6" of the bearer, they can re-roll Hit and Wound rolls of 1.

enhancements.name: Miniaturised Nebuloscope
enhancements.description: The bearer's ranged weapons gain [IGNORES COVER].

enhancements.name: Demanding Leader
enhancements.description: One VEHICLE or MOUNTED unit within 6" of the bearer can shoot after Falling Back.

enhancements.name: Chrono-Impedance Fields
enhancements.description: While the bearer is leading a VEHICLE or MOUNTED unit, each time an attack is allocated to a model in that unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic.

stratagems.name: Merciless Reclamation
stratagems.when: Your Shooting or Fight phase.
stratagems.effect: One NECRONS unit targeting a unit within range of an objective marker gains +1 to Wound.

stratagems.name: Unyielding Forms
stratagems.when: Opponent's Shooting or Fight phase, after your VEHICLE or MOUNTED unit is targeted.
stratagems.effect: If the weapon's Strength exceeds the unit's Toughness, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Chronoshift
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.effect: One VEHICLE or MOUNTED unit adds 6" to its Move characteristic when Advancing instead of rolling.

stratagems.name: Dimensional Tunnel
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase.
stratagems.effect: One VEHICLE or MOUNTED unit can move horizontally through models and terrain features.

stratagems.name: Endless Servitude
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.effect: One NECRONS unit within range of an objective marker you control has its Reanimation Protocols activate.

stratagems.name: Reactive Reposition
stratagems.when: Opponent's Shooting phase, after your unit is shot.
stratagems.effect: That unit can make a D6" Normal move (6" if VEHICLE or MOUNTED).

coreStratagems.name: Command Re-roll
coreStratagems.when: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon.
coreStratagems.target: An attack, model or unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon. TARGET: An attack, model or unit from your army. EFFECT: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.

coreStratagems.name: Counter-offensive
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase. EFFECT: Your unit fights next.

coreStratagems.name: Epic Challenge
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight.
coreStratagems.target: One CHARACTER model in your unit.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight. TARGET: One CHARACTER model in your unit. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.

coreStratagems.name: Fire Overwatch
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase. EFFECT: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase. RESTRICTIONS: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

coreStratagems.name: Go to Ground
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
coreStratagems.target: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets. TARGET: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.

coreStratagems.name: Grenade
coreStratagems.target: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Shooting phase. TARGET: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase. EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

coreStratagems.name: Heroic Intervention
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase. EFFECT: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase. RESTRICTIONS: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

coreStratagems.name: Insane Bravery
coreStratagems.when: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army.
coreStratagems.target: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems).
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army. TARGET: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems). EFFECT: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.

coreStratagems.name: Rapid Ingress
coreStratagems.when: End of your opponent's Movement phase.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: End of your opponent's Movement phase. TARGET: One unit from your army that is in Reserves. EFFECT: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase. RESTRICTIONS: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

coreStratagems.name: Tank Shock
coreStratagems.target: One VEHICLE unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Charge phase. TARGET: One VEHICLE unit from your army. EFFECT: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

weaponAbilities.Anti-X Y+: Improve wound roll to Y+ against targets with keyword X.
weaponAbilities.Assault: Can shoot after Advancing, with -1 to Hit.
weaponAbilities.Blast: Add 1 to Attacks per 5 models in target unit (min 3 attacks vs 6+ models).
weaponAbilities.Devastating Wounds: Critical Wounds inflict mortal wounds equal to Damage instead of normal damage.
weaponAbilities.Extra Attacks: Attacks with this weapon are made in addition to other melee weapons.
weaponAbilities.Heavy: Add 1 to Hit rolls if the unit Remained Stationary.
weaponAbilities.Ignores Cover: Target cannot have the Benefit of Cover.
weaponAbilities.Indirect Fire: Can target units not visible. -1 to Hit, +1 to target's Save if not visible.
weaponAbilities.Melta X: Add X to Damage at half range.
weaponAbilities.One Shot: Can only be used once per battle.
weaponAbilities.Pistol: Can shoot in Engagement Range, targeting units in Engagement Range.
weaponAbilities.Precision: On Critical Wounds, allocate attack to a CHARACTER in the target unit.
weaponAbilities.Rapid Fire X: Add X to Attacks at half range.
weaponAbilities.Sustained Hits X: Critical Hits generate X additional hits.
